articles.title: Kim Jong Il Greets Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Greets Syrian President
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Sunday sent a message of greetings to Bashar al-Assad, regional secretary of the Baath Arab Socialist Party and president of Syria, on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of the March 8 Revolution in Syria.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to you and the party, the government and the people of Syria on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of the March 8 Revolution in Syria.
					
					 After the revolution the Syrian people have made great progress in the work to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and build a modern Syria under the leadership of the party.
					
					I, availing myself of this opportunity, sincerely wish the Syrian people greater success in their efforts to retake all the Arab land occupied by Israel including Golan Heights and seek a fair and comprehensive solution to the Mid-east issue, and wish you good health and happiness.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Syrian President
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Bashar al-Assad, president of Syria, on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of the March 8 Revolution in Syria.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished the president and the people of Syria greater success in their work to seek a fair solution to the Mid-east issue and build a modern and prosperous Syria and expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Syria would continue to grow stronger in the future, too.

articles.title: KPA Panmunjom Mission Vows to Buildup Nuclear Deterrent
articles.content:
KPA Panmunjom Mission Vows to Buildup Nuclear Deterrent
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army issued a statement Sunday in connection with the fact that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities finally set about the DPRK-targeted Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers.
					 The maneuvers clearly indicate once again that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are the harassers of peace and warmongers keen to bring a war to this land. 
					
					  Under the prevailing situation the Panmunjom Mission of the KPA is authorized to state as follows:
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will no longer be bound to the Armistice Agreement and the north-south agreement on non-aggression.
					
					 There is no reason whatsoever for the DPRK to remain bounded to the AA and the non-aggression agreement now that the other belligerent party scrapped the AA and the other dialogue partner reneged on the non-aggression agreement.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will, therefore, legitimately exercise their force for self-defence, unhindered, just as they had determined to do. 
					
					 The process for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula will naturally come to a standstill and the DPRK bolster its nuclear deterrent for self-defence given that the saber-rattling is proven to be nuclear war exercises and maneuvers for a war of aggression against the DPRK in its nature.
					
					 It is an inviolable right of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK for self-defence to counter with powerful nuclear deterrent the U.S. nuclear offensive means threatening the territorial waters and air and land of the DPRK on account of exercises.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will be left with no option but to exercise merciless physical force as the rival is set to do harm to the DPRK no matter how dear peace, national reconciliation and cooperation are to it.
					
					 It is their stand to settle accounts with the rival by actual use of military force if it does not wish neither to conclude a peace treaty nor have reconciliation and cooperation.
					
					 All DPRK-U.S. and the inter-Korean military dialogues will be suspended as long as the DPRK-targeted war exercises go on.
					
					 It is illogical to sit face to face with the dialogue partner, who brings dark clouds of a nuclear war while leveling its gun at the other party, and discuss "peace" and "cooperation" with him.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should bear in mind that their reckless military acts will bring them nothing but bitter disgrace and destruction.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Workers' Contact
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Workers' Contact
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- An inter-Korean workers' contact was made in Shenyang, China, on Feb. 5 and 6.
					 Discussed there were the ways for boosting solidarity between workers in the north and the south, promoting national reconciliation and unity and taking the lead in opening the new phase for independent reunification this significant year marking the 10th anniversary of the historic June 15 north-south joint declaration. 
					
					Workers' organizations of the north and the south agreed to hold large inter-Korean workers' function for reunification in the area of the south side on the 120th May Day.
					
					 They also agreed to have a contact between workers of the north and the south in Pyongyang to have discussion on holding the May Day function for reunification and consolidating solidarity movement between workers of the north and the south and to promote diverse solidarity activities among organizations of different fields and industrial units this year.

articles.title: Pyongyang Maternity Hospital 30 Years Old
articles.content:
Pyongyang Maternity Hospital 30 Years Old
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The women in the DPRK call the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital their parents' home. The hospital is marking the 30th anniversary of its founding. 
					 The hospital, a modern comprehensive healthcare center for women, has served a total of more than 6,730,000 women.
					
					Under the profound loving care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il the hospital has a well-regulated system whereby women in childbed are provided with wild honey and efficacious medicines by the state free of charge.
					
					 He has continued sending modern medical facilities and apparatuses and expensive medicines to the hospital, helping it consolidate its material and technical foundation.  Besides, he has sent a lot of tonic such as more than 130 tons of wild honey, deer's placenta pastes, bear's galls and pine-nuts in more than 100 installments.
					
					 The amount of wild honey sent to the hospital in last February reached nearly eight tons. 
					
					 There are too many legendary stories to tell in the era of the Workers' Party of Korea that planes flew and ambulance cars ran to bring ordinary women to hospitals from solitary islets and remote villages of the country.
					
					 A south Korean woman, who came to Pyongyang to watch extravaganza "Arirang", gave an easy birth at the above-said hospital, receiving from all the Koreans delighted at the news the best wishes for a happy future of the child symbolic of reunification.
					
					 More than 7 000 foreign women have been given help in childbirth and obstetrical and gynecological treatment at the hospital thanks to the medical care of socialist Korea.
					
					 They were unsparing in their praises of the hospital, saying that it is an icon of socialism as it translates the beautiful dream of human beings into a reality.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Probe Truth about Concealed Crime
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Probe Truth about Concealed Crime
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the Japan Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare clarified its policy to start probing the truth behind the experiment on human bodies committed by the Imperial Japanese Army in the past in connection with the fact that remains of dead bodies were unearthed in the area of Shinjyuku Ward, Tokyo. 
					Minju Joson Sunday in a signed commentary observes in this regard: By origin, the issue of the above-said remains was a hideous crime that should have been clarified already long ago but the Japanese authorities have glossed over the case, claiming that "they are likely to be part of the specimens of human bodies used by a military medical school" and "they have nothing to do with the 'unit 713'" and the like.
					
					In the subsequent period there were more new evidence proving the experiments on human bodies conducted by the unit and the public attention was focused on this issue to give rise to the call for investigating the issue of the remains. This changed situation compelled the Japanese authorities to set about the work for unearthing the remains and investigating the case. 
					
					Brutal mass killings including the experiments on human bodies perpetrated by the Imperial Japanese Army against Korean people and other Asian people in the past were unprecedentedly hideous crimes. 
					
					Japan's settlement of its past crimes is a legal and moral duty and a historical task whose fulfillment should neither be delayed nor dodged any longer.
					
					Japan should probe the truth behind such hidden crimes as the horrible experiments on human bodies committed by the unit, though belatedly. 
					
					The Japanese authorities seem to persistently evade the settlement of the crimes, calculating that their past crimes will remain buried into oblivion and forgotten by people with the passage of time and the replacement of the old generation by a new one. 
					
					This is, however, a gross miscalculation. 
					
					The monstrous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean people in the past will always remain recorded as crimes and they will snowball unless Japan goes on without settling its past crimes, warns the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Obstruct Tour Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Obstruct Tour Flayed
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities claim that "there is no change in the stand that the tour should be resumed only after the settlement of the issue of safety of tourists" in a bid to justify their criminal acts of blocking the resumption of the tour and instill into the people distrust and hostility toward the compatriots.
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a mockery of the south Korean people hoping for the resumption of the tour and the reckless action seriously insulting the DPRK which has made sincere efforts to have their wish realized. 
					
					 Disclosing the aim sought by the south Korean authorities, which regard the life of people not worth one fly, by peddling the issue of "safety", the commentary goes on:
					
					 The south Korean people from all walks of life are set to make the "election to local self-governing bodies" due in June as an occasion for judging the conservative group getting hell-bent on sycophancy toward the U.S. and treachery, confrontation with compatriots and unpopular misrule. 
					
					 Internal scrambles for power are reported nonstop from ruling group in the meantime. 
					
					 It is against this backdrop that the south Korean authorities are resorting to mean methods to block the resumption of tour and shift the blame onto others, while persistently raising the "issue of safety of tourists" in a bid to mislead the public opinion, divert elsewhere the people's attention and thus tide over the ruling crisis.
					
					 However, this will only result in further deteriorating the inter-Korean relations and worsening their ruling crisis. 
					
					 If the south Korean authorities continue to obstruct the tour while making far-fetched assertions, the DPRK will be left with no other option but to take a decisive step. This step will include the cancellation of all tour-related agreements and contracts it granted to the south side out of special favor and freeze of real estate of the south side in the tourist resort.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop making far-fetched assertions, bearing in mind that they will be held fully accountable for all ensuing consequences.

articles.title: Unity of Pro-reunification Patriotic Forces Called for
articles.content:
Unity of Pro-reunification Patriotic Forces Called for
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- It is historical inevitability for pro-reunification patriotic forces to prevail over the separatist forces and emerge victorious. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The movement of national reunification is, in essence, the course of the struggle between the pro-reunification patriotic forces and the separatist forces and this course represented the history during which the former overpowered the latter. 
					
					 The Korean people should give a steady continuity to this admirable tradition.
					
					 The south Korean conservative ruling forces have persisted in the moves for confrontation while ceaselessly going against the trend of the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 The broad patriotic forces of reunification in the north and the south and overseas should stir up the wave for independent reunification firmly united under the banner of national independence and patriotism and dynamically conduct the movement for national reunification and thus prevail over the separatist forces and frustrate their anti-reunification and confrontation moves. 
					
					A decisive factor for winning a victory in the struggle against the separatist forces is to fully apply the idea of "By our nation itself" in the movement for reunification.
					
					Only when all the Korean nation firmly establish the independent stand in the movement for national reunification guided by the idea of "By our nation itself" and firmly unite under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration can they achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity, their cherished desire.
					
					The more desperate efforts the separatist forces make to stand in the way of the reunification movement the more decisive telling blows the patriotic force of reunification will deal to the traitors by dint of "By our nation itself" as they stand against the reunification while cooperating with foreign forces with their backs turned on the nation, the article concludes.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Policy of Discrimination against Korean Schools
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Policy of Discrimination against Korean Schools
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Committee for Independence and Reunification of the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea issued a statement on March 3 denouncing the Japanese authorities for their attempt to discriminate against the Korean schools in Japan.
					 The statement recalled that the Japanese government persistently resorted to the suppression and discrimination against the Koreans and their schools in Japan in the past, adding that not content with this, they are applying the anti-DPRK "sanctions" against the educational  field, too,  in a bid to institutionalize the national discrimination.
					
					 The Korean schools have observed Japan's law and regulations on schools both in the light of the contents of the education and their operation as legitimate national educational institutions, the statement noted, adding: Nevertheless the Japanese government seeks to institutionalize the discriminatory measures against the Korean schools, pursuant to the hostile policy toward the DPRK under the pretext of "abduction issue." This is an unreasonable national discrimination and human rights abuse running counter to the international convention on human rights and Japan's Constitution.
					
					  It urged the Japanese authorities to make an apology and reparation for Japan's past history of aggression and their discrimination against the Koreans in Japan and roll back at once the unreasonable policy of national discrimination.

articles.title: New Phase in Independent Reunification Called for in South Korea
articles.content:
New Phase in Independent Reunification Called for in South Korea
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a resolution on Feb. 28 in which it called for launching a dynamic struggle for bringing about a fresh phase in independent reunification under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					 The resolution referred to the valuable successes all the fellow countrymen have made in the arduous struggle for achieving independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity, meeting all challenges of the anti-reunification forces over the past decade since the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It called for fully demonstrating the firm will of all the compatriots for reunification and their stamina to bring about a new phase in independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the banner of the joint declaration by significantly commemorating the tenth anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It stressed the need for the people from all walks of life to pool efforts to foil the pro-U.S. conservative forces' anti-reunification confrontational policy, actively pave the way for improving the inter-Korean relations and make substantial progress in the reunification movement.
					
					 They will drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea as they only brought unbearable misfortune and pain to the Korean nation, decisively hold in check the belligerent forces' reckless moves to escalate the confrontation and ignite a war and thus build a new peaceful society free from foreign forces, it declared.

articles.title: Mexican Committee Praises Exploits of KPA
articles.content:
Mexican Committee Praises Exploits of KPA 
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism issued the 36th issue of bulletin titled "The Korean People's Army".
					 The bulletin in an article said that the KPA has played a leading role not only in the defence of the country but in all fields including the spiritual and cultural life and economic construction in the country, thus bringing the people great benefits. 
					
					 It noted that servicepersons of the DPRK successfully completed the Anbyon Youth Power Station by displaying the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the do-or-die spirit and the heroic self-sacrificing spirit in hearty response to the order of Supreme Commander of the KPA Kim Jong Il.
					
					 With the optimistic cultural lifestyle of soldiers prevailing in the society, the Korean people are leading a rich cultural and emotional life in their worksites and at families under the slogan "Let Us Go the Thorny Path Cheerfully!" the bulletin said, and continued:
					
					 The army has long made a great contribution to economic construction in the DPRK. The service personnel involved in the construction of the Huichon Power Station instilled into all the people the faith that they can surely attain the goal for opening the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 by creating the Huichon speed, a new Chollima speed.
					
					 The bulletin carried a photo of columns of military paraders of the KPA.

articles.title: Bangladesh Figure Supports Proposal for Celebration of Birth of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Bangladesh Figure Supports Proposal for Celebration of Birth of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, issued a statement on March 1 in support of the proposal to form the international preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President
					 Kim Il Sung.
					 He said in the statement that he joined the progressive people of the world in fully supporting the said proposal.
					
					 In the run-up to the birth anniversary of the President the progressive people of the world look back with deep emotion on the immortal revolutionary feats performed by him on behalf of mankind and his brilliant life, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The DPRK turned into a powerful socialist state and the anti-imperialist independent forces grew stronger in the international arena thanks to Kim Il Sung's brilliant ideological and theoretical activities and revolutionary practice. 
					
					 The great feats performed by him in the popular masses' cause of independence will remain shining forever along with human history.
